TopicTitle: Kerbal Attachment System (KAS) How to power electro-magnets!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

Using KAS and I'm wondering how to power electromagnets! I have one attached to a winch and I'm attaching it to another ship but it just says "magnet not powered" and it starts to float away.

Am I using the wrong attachment point or something? I can't seem to find any information about the electromagnet on the KAS wiki.
You have to right click on the magnet and turn it on. Or just use an action group.
